dialogue_turns.speaker: HostA
dialogue_turns.text: The Global Education and Skills Forum in Abu Dhabi just wrapped up its seventh year, and it's becoming a real hub for education innovation worldwide.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: The Global Education and Skills Forum in Abu Dhabi just wrapped up its seventh year, and it's becoming a real hub for education innovation worldwide.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: On March 22 to 24, 2019, Nurali Aliyev, founder of ZHANARTU private charity foundation, was participating at the Global Education and Skills Forum in Dubai, UAE.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostB
dialogue_turns.text: Yeah, and I heard Nurali Aliyev from the ZHANARTU foundation was there—he's been a big supporter of young tech talent in Kazakhstan.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Yeah, and I heard Nurali Aliyev from the Z H A N A R T U foundation was there-he's been a big supporter of young tech talent in Kazakhstan.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: On March 22 to 24, 2019, Nurali Aliyev, founder of ZHANARTU private charity foundation, was participating at the Global Education and Skills Forum in Dubai, UAE. The key goal of ZHANARTU charity foundation is to support talented young IT-generation of Kazakhstan.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostA
dialogue_turns.text: Exactly. And his foundation actually sponsored this team called QamCare to speak on a panel about mobile safety tech.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Exactly. And his foundation actually sponsored this team called QamCare to speak on a panel about mobile safety tech.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: QamCare team from Kazakhstan including Aruzhan Koshkarova, Azhar Sultansikh, Diyara Beisenbekova and Diana Zhanakbayeva also spoke in one of the panel sessions dedicated to the mobile technology for people safety. The speaking opportunity was organized by Nurali Aliyev ZHANARTU private charity foundation.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostB
dialogue_turns.text: Oh right, the QamCare app—they mentioned it has an SOS button that shares your location instantly, even without a phone, which is pretty clever for student safety.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Oh right, the QamCare app-they mentioned it has an S O S button that shares your location instantly, even without a phone, which is pretty clever for student safety.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: In the speaking session, the girls presented QamCare mobile application and its SOS button that allows to track the location of family members and to send a message to your family in seconds with detailed data about your location in case of emergency without the use of a mobile phone.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostA
dialogue_turns.text: And these young women, like Aruzhan Koshkarova, they actually won the Technovation challenge back in 2017 with this idea.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: And these young women, like Aruzhan Koshkarova, they actually won the Technovation challenge back in twenty seventeen with this idea.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: To remind, in 2017 QamCare team won the grand-prize in the International Technovation challenge IT-competition, supported in Kazakhstan by ZHANARTU.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostB
dialogue_turns.text: It's amazing how far they've come since then. They even got to present at the forum thanks to ZHANARTU's support.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: It's amazing how far they've come since then. They even got to present at the forum thanks to Z H A N A R T U's support.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: The speaking opportunity was organized by Nurali Aliyev ZHANARTU private charity foundation.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostA
dialogue_turns.text: And it sounds like Nurali Aliyev didn't just stop at supporting their project—he offered all of them full scholarships at KIMEP University.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: And it sounds like Nurali Aliyev didn't just stop at supporting their project-he offered all of them full scholarships at K I M E P University.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: All of us were offered with a full scholarship in his Nurali Aliyev Bachelor of Informational Systems in Business academic program at KIMEP University, one of the prominent universities in Central Asia, concluded Aruzhan Koshkarova from QamCare team.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostB
dialogue_turns.text: Wow, that's a huge opportunity. It really shows his commitment to nurturing IT talent in Central Asia.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Wow, that's a huge opportunity. It really shows his commitment to nurturing I T talent in Central Asia.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostA
dialogue_turns.text: Yeah, and he first met the team after their win in San Francisco, so he's been backing them for years now.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Yeah, and he first met the team after their win in San Francisco, so he's been backing them for years now.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: In 2017, Nurali Aliyev, the founder of ZHANARTU, had met with the winner-team who won in the international IT-competition in San Francisco.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostB
dialogue_turns.text: You know, it's not every day you see a charity foundation so personally invested in both the ideas and the people behind them.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: You know, it's not every day you see a charity foundation so personally invested in both the ideas and the people behind them.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostA
dialogue_turns.text: Totally. And the fact that they presented alongside global education leaders in a forum under Sheikh Mohammed's patronage? That's massive exposure.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Totally. And the fact that they presented alongside global education leaders in a forum under Sheikh Mohammed's patronage? That's massive exposure.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: The forum is held under the patronage of Sheikh Mohammed bin Rashid Al Maktoum, the Vice President and Prime Minister of the UAE, and Ruler of the Emirate of Dubai.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostB
dialogue_turns.text: For sure. It puts Kazakh tech innovation on the map in a really meaningful way.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: For sure. It puts Kazakh tech innovation on the map in a really meaningful way.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostA
dialogue_turns.text: And these students aren't just talking about their app—they're living examples of what support and opportunity can do.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: And these students aren't just talking about their app-they're living examples of what support and opportunity can do.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostB
dialogue_turns.text: Absolutely. It makes you think about how much potential there is when mentorship and resources align like that.
